channel.title: blender on Where Is Lucas
channel.description: Recent content in blender on Where Is Lucas

item.title: Blender 2020 - Week 1 - Escaping
item.description: I'll try to post 3D art every week here. This is the first creation I made this year with Blender. The main object with this project was to mess around with volumetrics lighting. This is rendered with eevee in Blender 2.8. I'll be happy to share the project files if asked!
